title: BRIEF-India's Kirloskar Oil Engines Says Sept Qtr Consol Net Profit Falls
text:
BRIEF-India's Kirloskar Oil Engines Says Sept Qtr Consol Net Profit Falls

Stock Markets 42 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 14:42)

BRIEF-India's Kirloskar Oil Engines Says Sept Qtr Consol Net Profit Falls Oct 24 (Reuters) - Kirloskar Oil Engines Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 400 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 408.6 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 8.18 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 8.51 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO

BRIEF-India's Kirloskar Oil Engines Says Sept Qtr Consol Net Profit Falls
description: BRIEF-India's Kirloskar Oil Engines Says Sept Qtr Consol Net Profit Falls
